result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.
result.ga: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.html: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: I'll be with you in a while.
result.ga: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaill
result.orig: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaill
result.html: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaillI'll be with you in a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé leat i gceann tamaillI'll be with you in a while.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.html: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí láċ i dtús báire aċ d'aṫraiġ sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: I spent a while in their company.
result.html: Chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadarI spent a while in their company.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé tamall ina gcoṁluadarI spent a while in their company.

result.eng: He stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ga: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.orig: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.html: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteachHe stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé tamall ag breaṫnú ar an seanteaċHe stayed a while looking at the old house.

result.html: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!
result.ponchtml: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!

result.eng: We have been here for some time.
result.html: Tá muid anseo le tamallWe have been here for some time.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid anseo le tamallWe have been here for some time.

result.eng: I live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ga: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.orig: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrach
result.html: Tá mise i mo chónaí tamall fada amach ar imeall na cathrachI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise i mo ċónaí tamall fada amaċ ar imeall na caṫraċI live a long way away, on the edge of the city.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: Luiġ Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: The spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ga: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.orig: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.html: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na spiairí á ḃfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
result.ponchtml: Tamall beag i ndiaiḋ a ġaḃáil ó ẛolas dóA little while after it got dark...
